message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90% and you get 10%.  We can adjust as we go.
Let's meet in the middle, but I think you'll want to negotiate!
I'm willing to go down a bit, but I'm not giving up 90% of the money.  How about we split it 60/40?  We're both getting more this way, and we can avoid more inflation.
You're being generous with 60%, but I think I can do better than 30% for myself. I'll take 7k, you can have the rest.
I think we can both do better than the last offers.  Let's split it 55/45.  This way, we both get a decent amount, and we don't have to worry about losing even more to inflation.
